name: MDLLightType
desc: Options for the shape and style of illumination provided by a light, used by the lightType property.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The type of the light is unknown or has not been initialized.

items.name: case ambient
items.desc: The light source should illuminate a scene evenly regardless of position or direction.

items.name: case directional
items.desc: The light source illuminates a scene from a uniform direction regardless of its position.

items.name: case spot
items.desc: The light source illuminates a scene from a specific position and direction.

items.name: case point
items.desc: The light source illuminates a scene in all directions from a specific position.

items.name: case linear
items.desc: The light source illuminates a scene in all directions from an area in the shape of a line.

items.name: case discArea
items.desc: The light source illuminates a scene in all directions from an area in the shape of a disc.

items.name: case rectangularArea
items.desc: The light source illuminates a scene in all directions from an area in the shape of a rectangle.

items.name: case superElliptical
items.desc: The light source illuminates a scene in all directions from an area in the shape of a superellipse.

items.name: case photometric
items.desc: The illumination from the light is determined by a photometric profile.

items.name: case probe
items.desc: The illumination from the light is determined by texture images representing a sample of a scene at a specific point.

items.name: case environment
items.desc: The illumination from the light is determined by texture images representing a sample of the surrounding environment for a scene.
